titles.title: Concerning United States assessed contributions to the United Nations.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on International Relations.

bill.summary: 7/25/2003--Introduced. Declares the sense of the House of Representatives that the Representative of the United States to the United Nations should seek an agreement to lower the assessment level of the United States for the regular budget of the United Nations when the United Nations General Assembly considers the scale of assessments for member nations for the period 2004 through 2006.
